title: Carefree
creator_credit: Mark Sandrich, Pandro S. Berman and RKO Radio Pictures
brief_description: Fickle Amanda Cooper (Ginger Rogers) has postponed her wedding so often that her fiance sends her to his best friend, a psychoanalyst, (Fred Astaire) for treatment. In spite of hypnosis and assorted other wacky attempts at remedies Amanda falls in love with her psychoanalyst. Cast also includes Ralph Bellamy, Luella Gear, Jack Carson. Lyrics and music by Irving Berlin.
